    • Uses of BadUserInputException in engine

      Methods in engine that throw BadUserInputException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Game.generateQuiz(int nrOfQuestions, java.util.List<java.lang.String> category)
      Generates a quiz with a given size and list of categories. throws BadUserInputException if the chosen size of the quiz exceeds the number of available questions in that category.
